definition: to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out

sentences.english: He called for negotiationson a “win-win solution”.
sentences.chinese: 他呼吁协商达成“双赢的解决方案”。

sentences.english: Ngoy-Mulunda is calling for the Congolese people to go and vote as that is their right.
sentences.chinese: 穆伦达呼吁刚果人民投票，因为这是他们的权利。

sentences.english: Sun Weide, spokesman for the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee, has urged that the Games not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥组委发言人孙维德呼吁不要将奥运会政治化。

sentences.english: Montanus called for less church hierarchy and more charismatic prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔努斯呼吁教会少层次和更魅力的预言。

sentences.english: She pleaded for dialogue and talked about democratic reforms.
sentences.chinese: 她呼吁通过展开对话讨论民主改革问题。

sentences.english: Organizers called on supporters to march from there to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 组织者呼吁支持者从祖科蒂公园游行至华尔街。

sentences.english: Socialist organizations called for the culprits to be hunted down.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义团体呼吁将这些犯人缉拿归案。

sentences.english: Arsène Wenger is backing the Football Association's call for greater respect to referees.
sentences.chinese: 温格支持足总关于尊重裁判的呼吁。

sentences.english: But their quality call mainly fell on deaf ears in the U.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们在质量方面的呼吁在美国却被当作耳旁风。

sentences.english: Beauvoir appeals women to seek their fortune in difficulties in "the second sex".
sentences.chinese: 波伏娃在《第二性》中呼吁女性在困境中寻找出路。

sentences.english: What we call for [is] all the sectors to work with us in dealing with the corruption.
sentences.chinese: 我们呼吁的是让所有部门和我们一起来对付腐败问题。

sentences.english: She called on GW students to continue to open their minds and serve others.
sentences.chinese: 她呼吁毛重学生们继续他们的思想和开放服务他人。

sentences.english: Chinese Education Department also made an urgent announcement, appeal people to raise alertness.
sentences.chinese: 中国教育部周四也发出紧急通知，呼吁提高警戒。

sentences.english: Blake called for an investigation into the violence and how it began.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克呼吁对暴力事件及其起源展开调查。

sentences.english: When I stop with motorbikes , it would appeal to me to go four wheels for many years.
sentences.chinese: 当我停止摩托车，它将呼吁我去四个轮子多年。

sentences.english: Thailand will call for re-negotiations on demarcation.
sentences.chinese: 泰国将呼吁重新就划界问题进行谈判。

definition: to resist/to boycott/to refuse (to cooperate)/to reject/resistance/refusal
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
all walks of life/all social circles
